product_name: Mountain Hardwear Turnagain Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Picking up a stylish, warm jacket like the Mountain Hardwear Turnagain is always in season. Its waterproof protection and warm synthetic insulation keep you cozy on the slopes or under the stars. Durable Dry.Q(TM) Core 2-layer nylon shell offers breathable, waterproof protection that efficiently transfers moisture away for warm, dry comfort. Thermic Micro(TM) polyester insulation distributes warmth evenly and is lightweight and compressible; synthetic insulation retains warmth even when wet. Fleece lining on back enhances warmth and extended cuffs protect hands and wrists. Hood protects you from the elements and offers enough space for your snow helmet. Quickly adjust the hood and hem with 1-hand drawcord pulls. Attached stretch powder skirt blocks out cold air and snow. The Mountain Hardwear Turnagain jacket include zippered handwarmer pockets and plenty of interior pockets to stash your gear and goodies. Closeout.
